name: Ecommerce Application
description: A work in progress user-friendly online shopping platform built using modern technologies. Commerce.js is integrated as the backend e-commerce solution handling functionalities such as product management, shopping cart, checkout, and payment processing.

name: Jokes
description: A single page web application for generating a list of random jokes from an external API using Axios, leveraging Material UI for a simple user interface. Data fetching and caching is handled using React Query.

name: Portfolio
description: Personal website built with React and hosted on Vercel. Designed and developed using Tailwind CSS with custom components supported with TypeScript.
